name: Shiny Happy Flappy Ball
description:
A prototype raymarched game inspired by flappy-bird but with physics-based movement where you play a shiny happy flappy ball, battling the twin elements of gravity and an inexplicably ever-increasing speed to become your best self.

So how good are you?

(with thanks to StumpyStrust for the free skybox here: https://opengameart.org/content/space-skyboxes-0)
